tests.name: Test all
tests.setup: wget https://apt.llvm.org/llvm.sh && chmod +x llvm.sh && sudo ./llvm.sh 14 && sudo apt-get -qq install valgrind clang-format-14 clang-tidy-14 && sudo ln -sf $(which clang++-14) /usr/bin/clang++ && sudo ln -sf $(which clang-format-14) /usr/bin/clang-format && sudo ln -sf $(which clang-tidy-14) /usr/bin/clang-tidy
